Please note these are the initial enrollment packages. You can choose an enrollment package to start with or you can select the Free Member option and choose a package later. You will have the opportunity to pay for your selected order after you login to the system. Your membership will be in a trial status and you will not be placed in the downline until your payment is received. You can change your package option later for any future orders. This is not a monthly commitment.
